package.name: Icon Renamer
package.shortDescription: This tweak has not been tested on iOS 12 and below. Should work for iOS 13.

descriptionlist.description: This package can rename your apps if you would like.
It's a good way to prank your friends or have a nice aesthetic with all of your apps.

You can also have
a multi-line item.

screenshot.description: So far, this tweak does not have any screenshots. Check back later and there might be screenshots.
